info.title: CI-SIS Cahier-de-Liaison - GestionnaireCdL
info.description: Le gestionnaire de cahier de liaison implémente le cahier de liaison

/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

/Bundle.summary: Manager for resources of type Bundle
/Bundle.description: The Manager for resources of type Bundle: provides services to manage the collection of all the Bundle instances

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

/Patient.summary: Manager for resources of type Patient
/Patient.description: The Manager for resources of type Patient: provides services to manage the collection of all the Patient instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type Patient based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: family
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A portion of the family name of the patient
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A portion of the family name

parameters.name: given
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [Patient](patient.html): A portion of the given name of the patient
* [Practitioner](practitioner.html): A portion of the given name

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the HumanName, including family, give, prefix, suffix, suffix, and/or text

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/DocumentReference.summary: Manager for resources of type DocumentReference
/DocumentReference.description: The Manager for resources of type DocumentReference: provides services to manage the collection of all the DocumentReference instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type DocumentReference based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: When this document reference was created

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Multiple Resources: 

* [AllergyIntolerance](allergyintolerance.html): allergy | intolerance - Underlying mechanism (if known)
* [Composition](composition.html): Kind of composition (LOINC if possible)
* [DocumentManifest](documentmanifest.html): Kind of document set
* [DocumentReference](documentreference.html): Kind of document (LOINC if possible)
* [Encounter](encounter.html): Specific type of encounter
* [EpisodeOfCare](episodeofcare.html): Type/class  - e.g. specialist referral, disease management

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

delete.summary: Delete the resource so that it no exists (no read, search etc)

204.description: If the resource is deleted - no content is returned

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
